languages.text: "Нужда в них отпала. Ярмо было почти завершено, а ситуация становилась все более нестабильна. Теодора погибла, культ Последнего восхода активизировался и готовил удар. А Иремерисс начала зарываться — она выдавала все больше заказов на ликвидацию, а когда я потребовал от нее умерить аппетиты, устроила диверсию. Похищение звезды Райкад было подгадано к моменту, когда на планете находился господин Хейнрикс. Архонт желала лишить меня агента и оставить послание".

"There was no more need for them, seeing as the Yoke was almost complete and the situation was escalating out of control. Theodora was dead, the Cult of the Final Dawn had reared its head and was preparing to strike. And Yremeryss had forgotten her place: she was putting forward too many elimination requests, and when I told her to curb her appetite, she retaliated. The theft of the Rykad star was timed to occur when Master van Calox would be on the planet. The Archon wanted to rob me of one of my agents and send a message."
languages.original_text: "Нужда в них отпала. Ярмо было почти завершено, а ситуация становилась все более нестабильна. Теодора погибла, культ Последнего восхода активизировался и готовил удар. А Иремерисс начала зарываться — она выдавала все больше заказов на ликвидацию, а когда я потребовал от нее умерить аппетиты, устроила диверсию. Похищение звезды Райкад было подгадано к моменту, когда на планете находился господин Хейнрикс. Архонт желала лишить меня агента и оставить послание".

traits.locale_text: "There was no need for them, seeing as the Yoke had almost been completed and the situation getting further out of control. Theodora was dead, the Cult of the Final Dawn started to actively prepare an attack. And Yremeriss started to get sloppy — she had been giving too many elimination orders, and when I asked her to curb her appetite, she had staged a diversion. The stealing of the Rykad star had been timed to Sir Heinrix's presence on the planet. The Archon wished to rob me of one of my agents and leave a message."

And Yremeriss started to get sloppy — she had been giving too many elimination orders, and when I asked her to curb her appetite, she had staged a diversion. The stealing of the Rykad star had been timed to Sir Heinrix's presence on the planet. The Archon wished to rob me of one of my agents and leave a message."

"There was no need for them, seeing as the Yoke had almost been completed and the situation getting further out of hand. Theodora was dead, the Cult of the Final Dawn started to actively prepare an attack. And Yremeriss began to get sloppy: she was giving too many elimination orders, and when I asked her to curb her appetite, she staged a diversion. The theft of the Rykad star was timed to match Sir Heinrix's presence on the planet. The Archon wished to rob me of one of my agents and leave a message."

Theodora was dead, the Cult of the Final Dawn had reared its head and was preparing to strike. And Yremeryss had forgotten her place: she was putting forward too many elimination requests, and when I told her to curb her appetite, she retaliated. languages.text: « Ils ne m'étaient plus d'aucune utilité, étant donné que le Joug était presque achevé et que la situation m'échappait de plus en plus. Théodora était morte, le Culte de l'Aube finale se préparait activement à lancer une attaque et Yremeryss se faisait trop présomptueuse : elle donnait des ordres d'élimination sans retenue, et lorsque je lui ai demandé de refréner ses ardeurs, elle a rué dans les brancards. Le vol de l'étoile de Rykad a été programmé pour coïncider avec la présence de maître van Calox sur la planète. L'archonte voulait me priver de l'un de mes agents et transmettre un message. »
languages.original_text: "There was no more need for them, seeing as the Yoke was almost complete and the situation was escalating out of control. Theodora was dead, the Cult of the Final Dawn had reared its head and was preparing to strike. And Yremeryss had forgotten her place: she was putting forward too many elimination requests, and when I told her to curb her appetite, she retaliated. The theft of the Rykad star was timed to occur when Master van Calox would be on the planet. The Archon wanted to rob me of one of my agents and send a message."

traits.locale_text: « Ils ne m'étaient plus d'aucune utilité, étant donné que le Joug était presque achevé et que la situation m'échappait de plus en plus. Théodora était morte, le Culte de l'Aube finale se préparait activement à lancer une attaque et Yremeryss commençait à devenir trop présomptueuse : elle donnait trop d'ordres d'élimination, et lorsque je lui ai demandé de refréner ses ardeurs, elle a rué dans les brancards. Le vol de l'étoile de Rykad a été programmé pour coïncider avec la présence de maître van Calox sur la planète. L'archonte voulait me priver d'un de mes agents et transmettre un message. »

languages.text: «Dejé de necesitarlos, ya que el Yugo estaba casi completo y la situación se escapaba a mi control. Theodora había muerto, el Culto del Amanecer Final había hecho acto de presencia y se preparaba para actuar e Yremeryss había olvidado cuál era su lugar: no dejaba de enviar solicitudes de eliminación, y, cuando le ordené que controlara su apetito, atacó. El robo de la estrella Rykad estaba planeado para coincidir con la llegada del maestro van Calox al planeta. La Arconte quería arrebatarme a un agente y enviar un mensaje».
languages.original_text: "There was no more need for them, seeing as the Yoke was almost complete and the situation was escalating out of control. Theodora was dead, the Cult of the Final Dawn had reared its head and was preparing to strike. And Yremeryss had forgotten her place: she was putting forward too many elimination requests, and when I told her to curb her appetite, she retaliated. The theft of the Rykad star was timed to occur when Master van Calox would be on the planet. The Archon wanted to rob me of one of my agents and send a message."

traits.locale_text: «Dejé de necesitar sus servicios, ya que el Yugo estaba prácticamente completo y la situación no dejaba de descontrolarse. Theodora estaba muerta y el Culto del Amanecer Final empezaba a preparar su asalto definitivo. Además, Yremeriss empezaba a fallarme: enviaba demasiadas órdenes de eliminación, y, cuando le pedí que controlara su apetito, preparó una distracción. El robo de la estrella Rykad se llevó a cabo al mismo tiempo que el señor Heinrix llegó al planeta. La Arconte quería arrebatarme a uno de mis agentes para enviarme un mensaje».

languages.text: “因为我已经不再需要他们了。圣枷已经差不多完成了，局势也变得越来越失去控制。西奥多拉死了，终末黎明邪教开始抬头，准备策划接下来的袭击。而伊芮梅莉斯也变得忘乎所以，她给了我太多需要消灭的敌人名单。我要求她克制一下胃口，可她却对我进行了报复。莱卡德星失窃的时间，刚好就是冯·卡洛克斯大师前往那颗行星的时间。她打算绑走我的手下，用这种方式来传达她的意思。”
languages.original_text: "There was no more need for them, seeing as the Yoke was almost complete and the situation was escalating out of control. Theodora was dead, the Cult of the Final Dawn had reared its head and was preparing to strike. And Yremeryss had forgotten her place: she was putting forward too many elimination requests, and when I told her to curb her appetite, she retaliated. The theft of the Rykad star was timed to occur when Master van Calox would be on the planet. The Archon wanted to rob me of one of my agents and send a message."

traits.locale_text: “因为我已经不再需要他们了。圣枷已经差不多完成了，局势也变得越来越失控了。西奥多拉死了，终末黎明邪教开始策划接下来的袭击。而那个时候，伊芮梅莉斯也变得草率起来，她给了我太多需要消灭的敌人名单。我要求她克制一下胃口，可她却打算转移我的注意力。莱卡德星失窃的时间，刚好就是海因里希大师前往那颗行星的时间。伊芮梅莉斯打算绑走我的手下，还打算用这种方式来传达她的意思。”

languages.text: "Sie waren nicht mehr nötig, da das Joch schon fast fertiggestellt war und die Situation außer Kontrolle geriet. Theodora war tot, der Kult der letzten Dämmerung hatte sich erhoben und setzte zum Angriff an. Und Yremeryss hatte ihre Stellung vergessen: Sie reichte zu viele Eliminierungsanfragen ein, und als ich ihr sagte sie solle ihren Appetit zügeln, rächte sie sich. Der Diebstahl des Rykad-Sterns erfolgte genau, als Meister van Calox auf dem Planeten war. Die Archontin wollte mir einen meiner Agenten rauben und mir eine Botschaft senden."
languages.original_text: "There was no more need for them, seeing as the Yoke was almost complete and the situation was escalating out of control. Theodora was dead, the Cult of the Final Dawn had reared its head and was preparing to strike. And Yremeryss had forgotten her place: she was putting forward too many elimination requests, and when I told her to curb her appetite, she retaliated. The theft of the Rykad star was timed to occur when Master van Calox would be on the planet. The Archon wanted to rob me of one of my agents and send a message."

traits.locale_text: "Sie waren nicht nötig, schließlich war das Joch fast fertiggestellt und die Situation war dabei, noch weiter außer Kontrolle zu geraten. Theodora war tot, und der Kult der letzten Dämmerung begann mit aktiven Vorbereitungen für einen Angriff. Und Yremeryss begann, nachlässig zu werden: Sie gab zu viele Eliminierungsbefehle, und als ich sie bat, ihren Appetit zu zügeln, organisierte sie eine Ablenkung. Der Diebstahl des Rykad-Sterns wurde für einen Zeitpunkt geplant, zu dem sich Sir Heinrix auf dem Planeten befand. Die Archontin wollte mir einen meiner Agenten rauben und eine Botschaft hinterlassen."

languages.text: 「ヨークがほぼ完成し、状況がさらに手に負えなくなっているのを見れば、その必要はなかったといえるだろう。シオドーラが死に、最後の夜明け教団が積極的に攻撃の準備を始めた。そしてイレメリスはその立場を忘れかけていた。彼女は殲滅命令を出しすぎたのだ。私がその貪欲さを抑えるように依頼すれば、彼女は報復した。ライカドの星の窃盗は、ハインリックス卿がこの惑星にいるタイミングに合わせて行われた。アーコンは私のエージェントの一人を奪い、メッセージを残そうとしたのだ」
languages.original_text: "There was no more need for them, seeing as the Yoke was almost complete and the situation was escalating out of control. Theodora was dead, the Cult of the Final Dawn had reared its head and was preparing to strike. And Yremeryss had forgotten her place: she was putting forward too many elimination requests, and when I told her to curb her appetite, she retaliated. The theft of the Rykad star was timed to occur when Master van Calox would be on the planet. The Archon wanted to rob me of one of my agents and send a message."

traits.locale_text: 「ヨークがほぼ完成し、状況がさらに手に負えなくなっているのを見れば、その必要はなかったといえるだろう。シオドーラが死に、最後の夜明け教団が積極的に攻撃の準備を始めた。そしてイレメリスはその立場を忘れかけていた。彼女は殲滅命令を出しすぎたのだ。私がその貪欲さを抑えるように依頼すれば、彼女は報復した。ライカドの星の窃盗は、ハインリックス卿がこの惑星にいるタイミングに合わせて行われた。アーコンは私のエージェントの一人を奪い、メッセージを残そうとしたのだ」

languages.text: "Boyunduruk neredeyse tamamlandığı ve durum kontrolden çıkmaya başladığı için onlara gerek kalmamıştı. Theodora ölmüştü, Nihai Şafak Tarikatı baş kaldırmıştı ve saldırmaya hazırlanıyordu. Yremeryss yerini bilmiyordu. Öldürme isteği çok fazlaydı ve ona sakin olmasını söylediğimde bana karşı geldi. Rykad yıldızının çalınması, Üstat van Calox gezegene gelmeyi planladığında gerçekleşecekti. Arkon, ajanlarımdan birini benden koparıp bir mesaj göndermek istedi."
languages.original_text: "There was no more need for them, seeing as the Yoke was almost complete and the situation was escalating out of control. Theodora was dead, the Cult of the Final Dawn had reared its head and was preparing to strike. And Yremeryss had forgotten her place: she was putting forward too many elimination requests, and when I told her to curb her appetite, she retaliated. The theft of the Rykad star was timed to occur when Master van Calox would be on the planet. The Archon wanted to rob me of one of my agents and send a message."
